title: Nano-Aperture Array Based Optical Imaging System on a Microfluidic Chip
abstract: We report the implementation of a novel nano-aperture array based imaging technique in a microfluidic network, termed "Optofluidic Microscopy (OFM)". The OFM prototype features high resolution, compact volume and capable of high-throughput sample imaging.
